    • Method Detail

      • flip

        public void flip()
        Method flip() first checks to make sure each pile isn't empty before dealing first card on each pile.

      • returnUserCard

        public Card returnUserCard()
        returnUserCard method returns Pile1Card
        Returns:
        Pile1Card (the user's card)

      • returnComputerCard

        public Card returnComputerCard()
        returnComputerCard method returns Pile2Card
        Returns:
        Pile2Card (the computer's card)

      • returnCompareValue

        public int returnCompareValue()
        returnCompareValue method returns compareValue field
        Returns:
        compareValue field (1 or 2)

      • compare

        public void compare()
        compare() compares Pile1Card and Pile2 Card. If Pile1Card is greater, method sets compareValue=1; if Pile2Card is greater, method sets compareValue=2. If the two cards are equal, compare() calls tie().

      • compare

        public void compare(Card card1,
           Card card2)
        compare(Card card1, Card card2) is overloaded method. It compares card1 and card2, setting compareValue field to 1 or 2 respectively.
        Parameters:
        card1 - First Card
        card2 - Second Card

      • tie

        public void tie()
        tie() deals the next 2 cards on top of each pile. It ignores the first cards respectively and calls the compare(Card1, Card2) method to compare the second cards.
